data.title: Fun and yummy
data.text: This little Uptown Whittier Icecream shop is like no other we have visited.  We visited it the first time with our kids and grandkids at the beginning of April and loved everything about it.  Pick out your fresh warm cookies and 2 scoops of icecream and you have your very own icecream sandwich.  The price is amazing for all you get. . .I ended up with one scoop because 2 was too much.  Wonderful fun place for the whole family.
